sentences.sentence: Secondly, mineral makeup is all natural and hypo-allergenic.
sentences.translation: 其次，矿物化妆品是纯天然和无刺激性的。

sentences.sentence: "Allergenic pollen and pollen allergy in Europe." allergy 62:976-990.
sentences.translation: 《欧洲引起过敏的的花粉和花粉过敏》——过敏症62：976 - 990。

sentences.sentence: Because no society has ever banned allergenic foods, conventional farmers have no incentive to plant reduced-allergy seeds.
sentences.translation: 因为没有哪个国家曾经禁用过敏性的食品, 所以传统的农民没有任何动力去种植低过敏的作物。
